game.title: The Missing Shipment
game.objective: Find the missing shipment of magical artifacts and return them to the Wizard's Council.
game.description: A shipment of magical artifacts was stolen from a merchant's wagon on its way to the Wizard's Council. The Council has sent out a call for adventurers to help locate and retrieve the missing shipment.
game.reward: A powerful magical artifact and a large sum of gold.

task.objective: Travel to the town of Redleaf and speak to the merchant who was robbed.
task.description: The merchant, Elara, can provide more information about the shipment and the circumstances of the robbery.

task.objective: Investigate the site of the robbery and search for clues.
task.description: The site of the robbery is located just outside of Redleaf. Look for any signs of a struggle or evidence of the bandits.

task.objective: Track down the bandits and interrogate them about the shipment.
task.description: The bandits are likely hiding in the nearby mountains. Use your tracking skills to find them and bring them back to Redleaf for questioning.

task.objective: Locate the missing shipment and retrieve the magical artifacts.
task.description: The shipment is hidden in a secret location within the mountains. Search carefully and use your wits to find it.

task.objective: Return the shipment to the Wizard's Council and receive your reward.
task.description: Once you have found the shipment, return it to Archmage Elminster at the Wizard's Council Tower in the capital city.
